name: Url-Shortener-bot-V2
description: Make short link by using Shortener using API key

CHANNELS.description: Enter True if you want the bot to work in Channels also else Leave it as it is

CHANNEL_ID.description: Enter your Channel ID, Leave this to deafault if CHANNELS set to False. Separate each ID by Space.

ADMINS.description: Your Telegram ID and ID of Users you want add as Admin. Separate each ID by comma.

UPDATE_CHANNEL.description: Enter the username or id of the channel for force subscription. Leave blank to disable

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Enter Your Log Channel id for information about users

IS_PRIVATE.description: Enter True if you want to restrict access to other users
